name: Craft ADV Essence 2-in-1 Shorts - Women's
description:
Tights aren't for everyone. These 2-in-1 shorts provide the support of tights with a lightweight outer short for coverage.Outer short is lightweight recycled polyester with some stretch.Supportive liner short wicks sweat from your body.Snug elastic with internal drawstring for a custom fit.Zippered rear pocket keeps keys or gels secure.

        Sustainability
